Text: How do I handle this situation?
Option1: Frank is in the wrong and needs to be diciplined.
Option2: Some sort of middle ground can be found.
Option3: Evan is in the wrong and needs to be diciplined.

Option1: He should be made to appologise to Evan for yelling.
Option2: He should be reprimanded for his promise on behalf of the company.
Option3: He should appologise and be told why ITS4 doesn't make those promises.

Option1: Both of them should be made to appologise for yelling.
Option2: Evan should be repremanded for starting office conflict| but Frank should apologise to Evan.
Option3: Frank should be remprimanded for being unethical| but Evan should appologise too.

Option1: He should be made to appologise to Frank for yelling.
Option2: He should be reprimanded for starting an office fight.
Option3: He should appologise and be told why what Frank did is not something to get upset about.
